history.content: I would take grad courses and do ml research - thats way more important than having a cs minor in my opinion

Hello, I am a senior majoring in Data Science, and graduating in Fall 2019.
I have already taken 3 upper division CS courses CS170, CS188 and CS189, and 2 lower division CS 61A and CS61B.
In terms of major in Data Science, I have taken all upper/lower division courses except 1 class.
I want to work as a machine learning engineer in the future, but I am wondering which is better between declaring CS as a minor and taking other classes.
Any suggestions?
Thank you for taking the time to read this.
history.subject: CS minor
